item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Christy's on Orange

Christy's is a great little Irish bar that we've been to before.....
but now it has an OUTDOOR PATIO and that's where you'll find us that night

Happy Hour drink specials run until 7pm:
$0.50 cents off well drinks, wine and draft beers

There will also be a small complimentary buffet inside the restaurant.

Contact info: Jeanie 203-494-3518

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Christy's on Orange
